## TextTechniqueParams interface

Render geometry as a text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface TextTechniqueParams extends BaseTechniqueParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [backgroundColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.backgroundcolor.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Text background color in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [backgroundOpacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.backgroundopacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Background text opacity value. |
|  [backgroundSize](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.backgroundsize.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Size of the text background (pixels). |
|  [canvasRotation](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.canvasrotation.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | \[\[TextCanvas\]\] rotation (radians). |
|  [color](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.color.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;[StyleColor](./harp-datasource-protocol.stylecolor.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Text color in hexadecimal or CSS-style notation, for example: <code>&quot;#e4e9ec&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;#fff&quot;</code>, <code>&quot;rgb(255, 0, 0)&quot;</code>, or <code>&quot;hsl(35, 11%, 88%)&quot;</code>.  color-hex |
|  [distanceScale](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.distancescale.md) | number | Scaling factor of the text. Defaults to 0.5, reducing the size ot 50% in the distance. |
|  [fontName](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.fontname.md) | string | Name of the preferred \[\[Font\]\] to be used when rendering. |
|  [fontStyle](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.fontstyle.md) | "Regular" \| "Bold" \| "Italic" \| "BoldItalic" | Glyph style to apply for the currently active \[\[Font\]\]. |
|  [fontVariant](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.fontvariant.md) | "Regular" \| "AllCaps" \| "SmallCaps" | Glyph variant to apply for the currently active \[\[Font\]\]. |
|  [hAlignment](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.halignment.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"Left" \| "Center" \| "Right"&gt; | Text position regarding the baseline. |
|  [label](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.label.md) | string | Field name of object containing the text to be rendered.<!-- -->@<!-- -->deprecated, Use <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;FIELD&quot;]</code>. |
|  [leading](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.leading.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Inter-line spacing (pixels). Scaled by <code>size</code>. |
|  [lineRotation](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.linerotation.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Line typesetting rotation (radians). |
|  [lineWidth](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.linewidth.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Maximum line width (pixels). |
|  [maxLines](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.maxlines.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Maximum number of lines for this label. |
|  [maxZoomLevel](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.maxzoomlevel.md) | number | Maximum zoom level. If the current zoom level is larger, the technique will not be used. |
|  [mayOverlap](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.mayoverlap.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, icon is allowed to overlap other labels or icons of lower priority.  <code>false</code> |
|  [minZoomLevel](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.minzoomlevel.md) | number | Minimal zoom level. If the current zoom level is smaller, the technique will not be used. |
|  [opacity](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.opacity.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | For transparent text, set a value between 0.0 for totally transparent, to 1.0 for totally opaque. |
|  [priority](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.priority.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Priority of text, defaults to <code>0</code>. Elements with highest priority get placed first. |
|  [reserveSpace](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.reservespace.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, element will reserve screen space, other markers of lower priority will not be able to overlap.  <code>true</code> |
|  [rotation](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.rotation.md) | number | Glyph local rotation (radians). |
|  [size](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.size.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Size of the text (pixels). |
|  [style](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.style.md) | string | Name of the text style. |
|  [text](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.text.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;string&gt; | Text to be displayed for feature.<!-- -->Defaults to first defined: - feature property <code>label</code> if present in technique (depreacted); - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;name:short&quot;]</code> is <code>useAbbreviation</code> is true; - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;iso_code&quot;]</code> is <code>useIsoCode</code> is true; - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;name:$LANGUAGE&quot;]</code> for each specified language; - <code>[&quot;get&quot;, &quot;name&quot;]</code>.<!-- -->See \[\[ExtendedTileInfo.getFeatureText\]\]. |
|  [textFadeTime](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.textfadetime.md) | number | Fading time for labels in seconds. |
|  [tracking](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.tracking.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;number&gt; | Inter-glyph spacing (pixels). Scaled by <code>size</code>. |
|  [useAbbreviation](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.useabbreviation.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the abbreviation (field <code>name:short</code>) of the elements is used as text. |
|  [useIsoCode](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.useisocode.md) | boolean | If <code>true</code>, the iso code (field 'iso\_code') of the elements is used as text. The <code>iso_code</code> field contains the ISO 3166-1 2-letter country code. |
|  [vAlignment](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.valignment.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"Above" \| "Center" \| "Below"&gt; | Text position inside a line. |
|  [wrappingMode](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.wrappingmode.md) | [DynamicProperty](./harp-datasource-protocol.dynamicproperty.md)<!-- -->&lt;"None" \| "Character" \| "Word"&gt; | Wrapping (line-breaking) mode. |
|  [xOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.xoffset.md) | number | Horizontal offset (to the right) in screen pixels. |
|  [yOffset](./harp-datasource-protocol.texttechniqueparams.yoffset.md) | number | Vertical offset (up) in screen pixels. |
